19850632425732915.Text: Restore spells restore fundamental attributes reduced by attribute-damaging magical effects. These spells are the only means of restoring attributes injured in this fashion. The most common restoration spells of this kind are: restore agility, restore endurance, restore fatigue, restore health, restore intelligence, restore luck, restore personality, restore speed, restore strength, restore willpower, and restore spell points.
